string.name: arcore_incompatible_error
string.description: Error message indicating the device is not compatible with ARCore. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: arcore_declined_error
string.description: Error message indicating that ARCore must be installed to use the app. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: arcore_fatal_error
string.description: Error message indicating there was a fatal error installing ARCore. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Please grant the required permissions from settings and try again
